data.message:
I never respond to ultimatums. But I was sickened by your statement tonight. I know you are not reading  this. So I am wasting my time. But you have the power to bring people together. Especially if it's a black vs white issue. You don't trust us enough to meet in the middle. You took a  side. You pointed out that I am on the other side. Sad. If you l knew
Me you wouldn't have. Oh well. I choose to be against you. Bye

replies.message: tRump is unfit for office and slim never gave a fuck.
Ha, Em condemning Trump.  One misogynist to another.   I really can't get upset about his statements, though I do agree with you, considering the lyrics and message he has put out.  It's rich really.
Were you sickened Chandy? Really?? Or are you being over dramatic cause he bashed your lord and savior Donald Gump?
